00003 Logger::Logger()
00004 {
00005         boost::filesystem::create_directory("logs");
00006         const std::time_t now = time(NULL);
00007         strftime(this->timestamp, sizeof(this->timestamp), "./logs/%Y%m%d-%H%M%S", localtime(&now));
00008         this->log_file = fopen(this->timestamp, "w");
00009 }

00033 {
00034         printf(" %i:\tmin: %.4f\tavg: %.4f\tmax: %.4f\n", generation, min, avg, max);

00038 void Logger::log(const std::multiset<Specimen> &population, GenotypeToStr genotype_to_str)
00039 {
00040         std::multiset<Specimen>::const_iterator top = population.begin();
00041 
00042         printf("\n  * Model specimen: %s\n\n", genotype_to_str(top->genotype));
00043 
00044         fputs("\n# Top 5:\n", this->log_file);
00045         for (int i = 1; i <= 5; i++)
00046         {
00047                 fprintf(this->log_file, "# %i. %s\n", i, genotype_to_str(top->genotype));
00048                 top++;
00049         }
00050         fclose(this->log_file);
00051 
00052         fopen("last_run.gp", "w");
00053         fprintf(this->log_file,
00054                 "set xlabel 'generation'\nset ylabel 'fitness'\n\nset autoscale x\nset yrange [0:1]\n\nset term png small size 480,320\n\nset key outside\nset key box\nset output '%s.png'\nset title '%s'\nset key title 'Legend'\nset style data linespoints\nplot '%s' index 0 title 'max', '%s' index 1 title 'min', '%s' index 2 title 'avg'",

00065 void Logger::log(double ticks)
00066 {
